comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: hotmediahub.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://hotmediahub.com/blog/post1?slid=3TK2V78Hji](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fhotmediahub.com%2Fblog%2Fpost1%3Fslid%3D3TK2V78Hji) ### Comment Username: @gripeinst > This website displays 3 captcha popup, which can be annoying, along with 9 security steps and it detects adblocker usage. > > The website is a new domain from terabox, so its structure is similar to terabox.fun. > > For example, you can find links like these: > - https://terabox.fun/sl/3TK2V78Hji > - https://hotmediahub.com/blog/post1?slid=3TK2V78Hji > > I tried copying a rule from "Annoyances Filter Tweaks" for terabox.fun and made some minor adjustments to the user rules. It seems to work as intended. > Reference: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/154877 > > hotmediahub.com#%#(async()=>{if(location.href.includes("?slid="))try{const t=new URLSearchParams(location.search).get("slid");if(!t||!t.length)return;const a=await fetch(`https://hotmediahub.com/shorturl/getoriginurl?&surl_key=${t}`),i=await a.json();if(i?.data?.origin_url&&i.data.origin_url.startsWith("http"))location.assign(i.data.origin_url)}catch(t){console.debug(t)}})(); ### Screenshots

labels.name: A: In progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.telsu.fi/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.telsu.fi%2F) ### Comment Username: @peace2000 > There's a big blank ad container at the top. To reproduce the current situation, enable the Finnish list. > > If I hide that element via: > > telsu.fi##.pb_t > > The site detects that ads are blocked, thus showing a nag about blocked ads. I can't figure out a working way for this. Restyling the container doesn't work either, the site seems to have checks for the style properties of the element. > > Note: the detection happens, when I try to view tv program information by clicking any tv program. The detection doesn't happen just by opening the main page. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Not reproduced it on my end. Perhaps some of the rules can't be executed in time.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/157481#issuecomment-1652378890
> Needing to watch an ad to play music on Pandora. Ads are still blocked even when disabled and allowed.

I have added rules which should fix it, filters update should be available in 1-2 hours.

<hr>

Regarding issue with log in - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/157481#issue-1822933575
Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce it.

>Additional testing finds that simply disabling the Adguard browser extension does not help. I have to use the Adguard Windows application and select 'disable' there.

Do I understand correctly that you use AdGuard AdBlocker extension and AdGuard for Windows application?
If so, what filter lists do you have enabled in AdGuard app and do you have `Stealth` mode enabled?

It seems to work as intended. > Reference: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/154877 > > hotmediahub.com#%#(async()=>{if(location.href.includes("?slid="))try{const t=new URLSearchParams(location.search).get("slid");if(!t||!t.length)return;const a=await fetch(`https://hotmediahub.com/shorturl/getoriginurl?&surl_key=${t}`),i=await a.json();if(i?.data?.origin_url&&i.data.origin_url.startsWith("http"))location.assign(i.data.origin_url)}catch(t){console.debug(t)}})(); ### Screenshots

Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.homedepot.com/p/GE-22-pt-Dehumidifier-with-Smart-Dry-for-Bedroom-Basement-or-Damp-Rooms-up-to-1500-sq-ft-in-White-ENERGY-STAR-ADHL22LA/315445853](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.homedepot.com%2Fp%2FGE-22-pt-Dehumidifier-with-Smart-Dry-for-Bedroom-Basement-or-Damp-Rooms-up-to-1500-sq-ft-in-White-ENERGY-STAR-ADHL22LA%2F315445853) ### Comment > chat box pops up from the right side randomly (not pictured), but you can still see the feedback/help buttons on the side. Hi.

Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will breaks configuration process.

If that doesn't help - contact our support for help support@adguard.com.

Also please test with Base filter only.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.iqiyi.com/v_2gddx4v0on4.html?iqiyi=o&bkt=list_main%2Cgreeting_rank3_d%2Cfilter_d%2Cgreeting_rank4_e%2Ccategory_page_05%2Cgreeting_rank2_d%2Cgreeting_rank1_h%2Cmr01%2Cgreeting_recall3_i%2Cgreeting_recall2_f%2Ccontent_c%2Ccategory_lib_b_1%2Clist_online&e=a2cd98fc301a1ca7de9d6c624514b048&stype=2&vfrm=category_lib.6&vfrmblk=S%3Alib_1_video&vfrmrst=S%3Alib_1_video_float_video_area12](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.iqiyi.com%2Fv_2gddx4v0on4.html%3Fiqiyi%3Do%26bkt%3Dlist_main%252Cgreeting_rank3_d%252Cfilter_d%252Cgreeting_rank4_e%252Ccategory_page_05%252Cgreeting_rank2_d%252Cgreeting_rank1_h%252Cmr01%252Cgreeting_recall3_i%252Cgreeting_recall2_f%252Ccontent_c%252Ccategory_lib_b_1%252Clist_online%26e%3Da2cd98fc301a1ca7de9d6c624514b048%26stype%3D2%26vfrm%3Dcategory_lib.6%26vfrmblk%3DS%253Alib_1_video%26vfrmrst%3DS%253Alib_1_video_float_video_area12) ### Comment > 之前开启移动广告过滤器后 可以过滤爱奇艺暂停广告 但是2023年7月22日开始失效 会间歇性出现暂停广告 解决办法是关闭edge浏览器重开后 在一定时间内可以过滤 但是超过1个小时左右就失效 查看过滤日志 发现失效后 在已修改统计下 会有很多条爱奇艺记录（正常过滤时候 已修改分类下不存在记录） ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/4bjgcae14ps0s80kgsk484c8o0go0kgi8l6m9k7bvw.png?nc=1)

issue.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.bihann.com/cast/672.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bihann.com%2Fcast%2F672.html) ### Comment > #156301 > @Sergey-Lyapin > > Thanks for addressing this issue. > > I disabled the DNS settings and it worked fine for nehannn.com. However, it does not work on bihann.com. A blank screen appears when I tap on it. > > I checked the AdGuard filter to see if there was any difference between nehannn.com and bihann.com. As a result, I found the following rules only for nehannn.com. I changed the domain of these rules to bihann.com and added them to the user rules and it worked fine for bihann.com. > > in Tracking Protection filter > @@||google-analytics.com/analytics.js$domain=nehannn.com > > in Japanese filter > @@||amazon-adsystem.com/aax2/apstag.js$domain=nehannn.com > @@||g.doubleclick.net/gampad/ads?$xmlhttprequest,domain=nehannn.com > @@||g.doubleclick.net/gpt/pubads_impl_$script,domain=nehannn.com > @@||g.doubleclick.net/tag/js/gpt.js$domain=nehannn.com > @@||googlesyndication.com/pagead/managed/js/adsense/*/show_ads_impl_$script,domain=nehannn.com > @@||googlesyndication.com/safeframe/$subdocument,domain=nehannn.com > @@||pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js$domain=nehannn.com > nehannn.com#@#[id^="google_ads_iframe"] ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://ok.ru/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fok.ru%2F) ### Comment Username: `@sevastyanov` > Добрый день! Вас опять приветствует разработчик Одноклассников. У нас с начала июля идет заметный поток жалоб на зависания сайта. Сразу были подозрения на AdGuard, но не было доказательств. Наконец, один из пользователей прислал по нашей просьбе запись Performance в инструментах разработчика Chrome. Скриншот приложил. Сам файл прислать не могу, т.к. боюсь передачи каких-либо персональных данных юзера. Но готов посодействовать в предоставлении дополнительной информации. ### Screenshots
